excerpt: "The 3D sensor market was valued at US$ 6.4 billion in 2022. Between 2023 and 2031, the market is expected to expand at a CAGR of 13.6%, reaching US$ 20.1 billion by 2031. Enhanced monitoring and threat detection capabilities through 3D sensors for security and surveillance."
